review: Fire stick is great, but there are not enough good movies on Prime.
author: Patricia Wofford

review: I purchased this for my daughter's playroom.  My husband and I have the Fire TV for our use.  While this does tend to be a tad slower than the fire TV it still works great and we haven't had any issues with it.  We have had it for over 2 months now.
author: K. Bryant

review: I have nothing but good things to say about the Fire TV Stick! I cannot compare it to the Fire TV, because I've only used these... but I have two now, and I use them 1) on an older tv that is not a smart tv and 2) on a newer tv that I purposefully bought as a non-smart tv because I knew I'd be using a Fire TV Stick with it. My daughter benefits from this device every day and night. She watches all of her favorite cartoons thanks to the availability of Netflix and even a little Amazon Prime Video! It comes with Amazon Prime for a certain amount of time included, can't remember how much. I've always been a prime member, and this device was no exception to my satisfaction with Amazon and its own line of products! Thanks, Amazon! Keep up the good work!
author: Joshua Storme King

review: This thing is awesome at an awesome price! My kids love it!
author: Brett McCollum

review: It's a cool device but just thought would be more and an easier remote
author: mark

review: Works well. Perfect for bringing on road trips for hotel use.
author: Ronald G. Ifferte

review: This is a great device for me to take on the road in hotels. Once I figure out screen mirroring, I'm totally set.
author: M. Anderson

review: This has more television series than movies, which I was looking for.
author: Mary
